name: Plague Escape (baconation)
description:
Control a young child trying to get home to his parents. Cross a deadly plague ridden bog as you navigate narrow planks and avoid forceful gas bubbles. Make it home as fast as you can and share your score in the comments!

Make a choice between 2 paths, one easier but slower, or one harder but faster. Manage your stamina and balance to make it to the end.

This is my first project in UE5 so let me know what you think. If anyone has tips for optimizing performance feel free to contact me. Thanks!



Controls:

Move - WASD

Run - Left Shift

Pause - Esc

Assets used:

Bluenesia Font - Khurasan (1001freefonts.com)

Dead Trees  - Polygonal Foliage Asset Package (AlignedGames)

Cocksfoot Grass & Grass Clumps - Megascans

UE5 Starter Content

AJ character & animations - Mixamo

Footstep audio - PMSFX Sampler 2019 & Happy Soul Music Library

Bubble pop audio - Greenvwbeetle (Freesound.org)

Lava audio - Fission9 (Freesound.org)

Freelncr (Freesound.org) - Calming/Relaxing Ambience Loop
